name: Barebones-Boilerplate-Node-Express-React-Nuclearjs-ES6-Webpack
Title: A Bearbones Boilerplate NuclearJS App
Description: Setup with Express and React in ES6 with webpack and nodemon

scripts.start: (node_modules/.bin/nodemon -e js,jsx,json -w index.js -w app.js -w config -w views -i src -- index.js)

author: Stefan Hayden
